explains: n. 花名册；执勤人员表；逐项登记表
wordGroup: duty roster 值勤表；轮值表；轮职表

sentences.en: The Amateur Softball Association's roster of umpires has declined to 57,000.
sentences.cn: 业余垒球协会的裁判员名单上的人数减少到了5.7万人。

sentences.en: The next day he put himself first on the new roster for domestic chores.
sentences.cn: 次日，他在新的内务值勤表上把自己排在第一个。
作为他们的供应商名册。
